column2: pron. ) was Nerdanel Amilessë for her twin sons Amrod and Amras. It translates as "top-russet"
column3: referring to the color of their hair.  After Fëanor their father insisted on giving them each separate names Nerdanel named Amras Umbarto
column5: and Fëanor changed it to Ambarto.  But the twins each still called the other Ambarussa.
column6: The names of the Sons of Fëanor with the legend of the fate of Amrod
